thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com | 4 of 334
thread.title: Jacqueline
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Jacqueline

author: Jacqueline
title: Jacqueline
text: Great product, good quality. Easy ordering and fast shipping. Great coupon and shipping discounts. My dad is incontinent and can't get up at night to go to the bathroom and these briefs allow him to sleep through the night and hold a lot of liquid. I also add the booster pads for added protection and the liquid goes through to keep his skin dryer.
